lyrics:
33 contributorschapter four lyricsverse 1
conceived and born was one of light give me your hand
blood is spilt and man will follow
rain and dark the other born black night infernal man
punishment too great to bear

prechorus
raise your head and taste the courage the one of light
fall from grace unholy night

chorus
ive come here to kill you
wont leave until youve died
murder born of vengeance
i closed my brothers eyes tonight

verse 2
conceived and born was one of light give me your hand
blood is spilt and man will follow
rain and dark the other born black night infernal man
punishment too great to bear

prechorus
raise your head and taste the courage the one of light
fall from grace unholy night
see avenged sevenfold liveget tickets as low as 20you might also likechorus
ive come here to kill you
wont leave until youve died
murder born of vengeance
i closed my brothers eyes tonight

verse 3
its cold tonight as the clouds turn grey
and from my hands to my brothers grave
you took his side you took his gift
feel the power of a fallen man
crestfallen man

refrain
far away in this land i must go
out of the sight of the one
a punishment sent from his hands
a hardship that no one should know
now go out of the sight of the one
away in this land you must go

verse 4
where has he gone what have you done
a voice commands from high above this earth
from the soil his blood cries out to me
murder liar vengeance deceit
outro
far away in this land i must go
out of the sight of the one
a punishment sent from his hands
a hardship that no one should know
now go out of the sight of the one
away in this land you must go7embed
